name: Gems
content:
Gems

Name Rank Tags Timing Target Range Check Price Description
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.gems.ggAbykg69rnRKnyW]{Life-Calling Jewel I} 1 Gem, Consumable Major Single Close None 20

Increase your Hate by +1. This jewel only produces an effect when the target is of the Healer Archetype. The target removes the [Incapacitated] condition, and recovers [Target's CR] HP. (Fate 1): This item's Hate cost is reduced to 0. (CR11): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.gems.rXhySyjTsD7GEUAi]{Jewel of Rebirth I} 1 Gem, Consumable Major Single Close None 40

Increase your Hate by +2. The target removes the [Incapacitated] condition, and recovers [Target's CR] HP. (Fate 1): This item's Hate cost is reduced to 0. (CR11): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.gems.G6Wa7596fRRHZjoQ]{Barrier Jewel I} 1 Gem, Consumable, Rare Setup Self Close None 40

Increase your Hate by +1. The target gains [Barrier: 15].
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.gems.HNpi2rnIpY8IzA4j]{Jewel of the Firefly} 1 Gem, Consumable Setup Wide 20 (A) Close Automatic 40

Increase your Hate by +1. All [Dim Light] [Night] and [Darkness] effects within range are negated. This effect ends when the scene does. (Fate 1): This item's Hate cost is reduced to 0.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.gems.IXmhagAapckU5ZEb]{Fish Scales Gemstone I} 2 Gem, Consumable Setup Self Close None 45

Increase your Hate by +1. The target gains the [Aquatic] tag. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. (Fate 1): You can use this item with [Target: Wide 2 (P)]. (CR12): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.gems.tp2Qaqbo0VqX42dk]{Mystic Wing Gemstone I} 3 Gem, Consumable Setup Self Close None 50

Increase your Hate by +1. The target gains [Flight]. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. (CR13): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.gems.XYZCCiarZlt6gkgt]{Jewel of Seeing I} 5 Gem, Consumable Setup Wide 20 (A) Close Automatic 80

Increase your Hate by +1. This jewel targets all Props within range that have the [Nature] tag as well as a [Detection Difficulty]. The target's [Concealed] status is removed. (Fate 1): All targeted Props also take a -2 penalty to their [Analysis Difficulty] and [Disable Difficulty]. (CR15): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.gems.YL244zSnQUY6aOtS]{Jewel of the Swift Horse I} 8 Gem, Consumable, Rare Setup Self Close None 140

Increase your Hate by +1. The target gains a +1 bonus to [Speed]. Treat this effect as a Combat Status that lasts until the end of the round. (Fate 1): This effect lasts until the end of the scene instead. (CR18): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.gems.9N9qrhmCEziRacEA]{Life-Calling Jewel II} 11 Gem, Consumable Major Single Close None 120

Increase your Hate by +1. This jewel only produces an effect when the target is of the Healer Archetype. The target removes the [Incapacitated] condition, and recovers [Target's CR + 10] HP. (Fate 1): This item's Hate cost is reduced to 0. (CR21): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.gems.bjnA96NbCPEQYZbz]{Jewel of Rebirth II} 11 Gem, Consumable Major Single Close None 240
